name: Promethium
short_description:
What is Promethium OS, exactly?
Promethium is a Linux-based operating system (built with SUSE Studio), a suite of software that makes your computer run. You can use the Promethium OS to replace or to run alongside of other operating systems such as Microsoft Windows™ or Mac OS X™ Or Another Linux Operating System (E.G. Ubuntu "(classname)Visit Site(Ubuntu Site)":http://www.ubuntu.com/). The Promethium is 100% free of cost for you to enjoy and share.

*100% Free & Open Source*
Promethium is 100% gratis and consists of free & open source software. Many of the Linux variants and many Linux programs are open source and enable users to customize or modify the code however they wish to
.
*Thousands of Free Apps!*
With thousands of apps across 10,000+ packages, Promethium’s got an app for you.

*Virus- and Spyware-Free*
No more antivirus and spyware hassle! Linux is and has always been a very secure operating system.
